title: NButtonProps
description: Neuron button component with multiple variants and sizes. Wraps shadcn/ui Button with extended functionality including icon support and custom sizing.

label.description: Text content displayed inside the button.

variant.description: Visual style variant of the button.

size.description: Size of the button. Use 'icon' for icon-only buttons.

icon.description: Icon name to display inside the button (e.g. 'Plus', 'Trash2').

iconPosition.description: Position of the icon relative to the label text.

disabled.description: Whether the button is disabled and non-interactive.

onClick.description: Binding key for the click event handler.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
